name: The Adventures of Harold
description:
Bird Poachers have become more and more recently in the town of “Parakee”.

Believe it or not, but it's full of parakeets, and the local old man bird watcher Harold has been in distraught due to the recent appearance of Poacher Pete and his legion of poachers, so he wants to bring out the big guns, without any actual guns.

Harold is a descendant of a Samurai that had fought in the Seinan War, so his swordsmanship skills have been passed onto him along with his love for birds.

Harold is about to get Hysterical with Poacher Pete. So he ventures into the forest to free the birds from Poacher Pete.

Credits:

Backgrounds/Scenes/UI - Frankie Redman
